#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<time.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

#define gc getchar_unlocked
void scanint(int &x);

int main()
{	
    string input;
    getline(cin,input);
    for(int i=0;i<input.length();)
    {
        if(input[i]=='a' || input[i]=='e' || input[i]=='i' || input[i]=='o' || input[i]=='u')i+=2;
        printf("%c",input[i]);
        i++;
    }
    
        return 0;
}


void scanint(int &x)
{
	int flag=0;
	register int c = gc();
	if(c == '-') flag=1;
	x = 0;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
   	if(flag == 1)x=-x;
}
